product_name: The North Face Ultra FP Mid GTX Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: Delivering lightweight performance and waterproof protection, the Ultra Fastpack Mid GORE-TEX(R) Hiking Boots from The North Face are built for moving light and fast over tough trails. Over-the-ankle coverage provides added support and stability; lightweight materials and streamlined design help you feel more nimble than with standard boots. Water-resistant mesh uppers with synthetic overlays provide lightweight structure and support. GORE-TEX waterproof, breathable membranes keep feet dry in wet conditions. EVA midsoles provide comfortable cushioning for long days on the trail. Pebax(R) polymer shanks provide torsional stability, impact protection and energy return; Pebax is lighter than polyurethane and is built to withstand extreme temperatures. Built-in CRADLE(TM) stability technology guides your foot through biomechanically efficient positions from heelstrike to toe-off, enabling smooth, efficient strides. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles on the Ultra Fastpack GORE-TEX Mid Hiking Boots provide great grip on wet or uneven surfaces.
short_description: Delivering lightweight performance and waterproof protection, the Ultra Fastpack Mid GORE-TEX(R) Hiking Boots from The North Face are built for moving light and fast over tough trails.
